caption.title: in vivo validation of the biological properties of the IC virus in susceptible mice, survival curves.
caption.p: Groups of 5 adult female BALB/c outbred mice were injected i.p with 1, 10, 100, 1000 PFU of parental (P) or recombinant (IC) IS-98-ST1 virus. Mice were monitored for 15 days post-infection. Data shown are representative of two independent experiments.
